comment.author: 22107689@N03
comment._content: Juarez, Mx?  Who did the shooting?

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
The shelling was shooted by the revolutionary army of Francisco I. Madero, between May 8 
and 10, 1911.
Dr. Roberto Duarte

comment.author: 53461717@N08
comment._content:
There are two pictures of the same corner, one with the foot note:  RUINS OF MONTES HOUSE; is not copyrighted.  Pending in which collection can be found.  The other says ADOBE HOUSE DESTROYED BY ARTILLERY.  Nr. 1138, W. H. Horne Co.  El Paso, Tex..  There are depicted 6 cavalry insurrectos on horse back, in front of the same house.
Dr. Roberto Duarte
